name: pigalle-mvc-plugin-datetime-converter-alpha
description: A set of ES7 decorators used to convert datetime in HTTP request and response bodies
readme:
# Datetime converter plugin for Pigalle MVC [![Build Status](https://travis-ci.org/9fevrier/pigalle-mvc-plugin-datetime-converter.svg?branch=master)](https://travis-ci.org/9fevrier/pigalle-mvc-plugin-datetime-converter)

A set of ES7 decorators used to convert datetime in HTTP request and response bodies.

## Requires

* [NodeJS](http://nodejs.org) >= 5.7.0 

## Installation 

    npm install pigalle-mvc-plugin-datetime-converter

## Tests

    npm test
    
## Build

    npm install
    gulp babel
   
## Live development

    gulp watch
   
## Usage

## Example


## Change history

### v0.1.0 alpha (2016-11-22)

Initial version including :

* `@RequestChangeDatetimeToTimestamp`
* `@ResponseChangeDatetimeToTimestamp`
